mapper.sql: select id, user_name, nick_name, password, status, email, phone_number, sex, avatar, user_type, create_by, create_time from sys_user
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`permissions` FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role` r ON r.`id` = ur.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON rm.`role_id` = ur.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0
